definition: Describing something that is visually appealing or attractive, often used to express the attractiveness of a person, object, or design. It is commonly used to convey the idea of being aesthetically pleasing or having an appealing appearance.

examples.german: Das Buch hat ein ansprechendes Cover.
examples.english: The book has an appealing cover.

examples.german: Die Wohnung ist sehr ansprechend eingerichtet.
examples.english: The apartment is very tastefully furnished.

examples.german: Der Vortrag war sehr ansprechend und informativ.
examples.english: The presentation was very engaging and informative.

examples.german: Das Restaurant bietet ansprechende Speisen an.
Die Werbung ist sehr ansprechend gestaltet.
examples.english: The advertisement is designed in a very appealing way.
